summary:
-Summon a Demora for twice as long - [b]120 seconds[/b]
-Enchantment is now 8000 - default was 3000, meaning more charges for more carnage.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Simple mod. Decided 60 seconds wasn't long enough for my pal Valkynaz.

[b][color=#ff0000]Features:[/color][/b]
-[color=#00ffff]Summon a Demora for twice as long - [b]120 seconds[/b]
-Enchantment is now 8000 - default was 3000, meaning more charges for more carnage.[/color]

[b][color=#ff0000]Possible update:[/color][/b]

[color=#ffff00]-Extend the target range to summon.[/color]

Should not cause any conflicts.

Enjoy![/size]
author: HyPNOS
